name: Ragslash
description:
Ragslash is a physics based building and general messing around sandbox game.

Kill Ragdolls.

You can kill the ragdolls in a variety of ways, such as crushing, tearing apart, exploding, or using physics against them.

Build.

You can build structures, killing machines, and more, utilizing the physics and built in tiles.

Customize.

You can customize each object using the component system, allowing you to create the tiles you want. Oh, and you can also give items custom images (with the item's physics adjusting to work with those images!), allowing you to make your creations look and be shaped however you want.
